commands.name: !ping
commands.description: Test ping to verify bot response. Usage: !ping

commands.name: !help
commands.description: List all available commands and their descriptions. Usage: !help

commands.name: !addToon
commands.description: Adds a toon, level can have up to 2 decimal places. Usage: !addToon <ownerName> <toonName> <3 letter race code> <class> <level>
